resources.string: Feel free to reach out if you’d like to connect or collaborate on a project! You can contact me via the form below or through my GitHub and LinkedIn profile.

I\'m currently pursuing my MCA at Galgotias University and have completed a Full-Stack Development program with MyCaptain. My journey in web development has been driven by a love for problem-solving and creative design. I thrive on continuous learning and enjoy experimenting with new technologies to enhance my projects. Apart from coding, I’m passionate about traveling, cooking, photography, and music, which often influence my creative process. I love observing the world around me and finding inspiration in everything I do, both professionally and personally.
